::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

    Optimus Prime reached out =
and grabbed the sword, just holding it there.
    "There will be no bloodsh=
ed today," Prime said. "Whatever these bots did, I'm sure they have their r=
easons. Please allow them to explain."
    Eclipse looked at the bot and sh=
ifted to his most powerful form, the Werewolf. "We left the Cybertronian Fi=
re because our work will not benifit if I am destroyed. The Alliance was co=
ming dangeroudly close to destroying the CF. I had to get out. I am now ret=
urning to the CF, with Optimus Prime, here."
  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, Februar=
y 05, 2001 11:51 AM
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


  Razor Claw =
stood unmoving, staring Wolveritron down.

  "You don't fight back?" he gla=
red at the deserter HOPING FOR A RESPONSE.

  "You do not fight then you ad=
mit your guilt." he drew his sword and swung it in a backslashing motion at=
 a level to decapitate Wolveritron.


    ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
 From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, Febr=
uary 01, 2001 9:31 PM
    Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    Razor=
 Claw stands up straight, looking toward Prime. "Stay out of this, you are =
not part of the accused or a viable witness so you have no say in what happ=
ens to these deserters."

    The mutant wasn't exactly what bots would con=
sider sane. he was injected with a virus to stabilize his double transforma=
tion but was only given one sequence to key upon. Maybe it was the virus, m=
aybe it was his injuries, or maybe the former Pred was just sickened by bot=
s who'd run from a battle and leave thier comrades to suffer the pains of b=
attle.

    "Now for business I was dealing with you!" he reached out and p=
oked Wolveritron in the chestplate trying to pursue his issues.


      ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
      From: dachande 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
      Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 1:57 PM
      Subject: Re: =
Dachande respond or else


      ::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus:=
:

          They had not heard Razor Claw ask them to stop, but they heard=
 him the second time. Prime was walking away, but he stopped and came back.=

          "Is there something you need from us?" Prime asked.
        ----=
- Original Message ----- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 10:22 AM
        Sub=
ject: Re: Dachande respond or else


        It all started back when...


=
           ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: dachande 
        =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM=

          Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


          ::Eclipse/W=
olveritron/Ramus::

              They had heard the battling and decided t=
o run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ra=
n into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exited the base, in bea=
st modes. And headed far away

          So I responded with...
          .=
 
          Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the battle a=
nd mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentally reported his act=
ions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three until they were out o=
f the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and =
confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your choice."

  =
        Then a few more posts of Razor Claw tracking them until finally Opt=
imus Prime (Razor Claw doesn't know enough about Prime to recognise him) Wo=
lveritron, Ramus, and Eclipse were finally together. and Razor Claw caught =
up with them.(I can't find the cave posting I thought it was those three th=
at were in the same cave as Vuloise.)

          He aproached the three bot=
s ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully







=

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
